name.baseName: Mining ; Copper ore ; Copper ore ; Surface mining ; All sizes; NESPS2
采矿 ; 铜矿石 ; 铜矿 ; 露采 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程涉及所有规模的铜矿石露天采矿。开采出的铜矿石可用于多种应用，例如电线电缆、屋面和管道材料、工业机械以及生产青铜和黄铜等合金。采用末端处理技术管理废水并降低化学需氧量。采用化学沉淀和沉淀分离等技术来管理和减少汞、镉、铅和砷等重金属的污染，并具有不同程度的技术效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码09,四级代码0911文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisChemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是化学沉淀法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/企业正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为汞
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是沉淀分离，其效率为30，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/企业正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为汞
